Yuu is originally a girl (XX), retains her vagina and other reproductive organs (primary sex characteristics), and breasts/hips (secondary sex characteristics), and the only difference is that she has a temporary penis that grew because of magic. Might make her a hermaphrodite, but even then  she is 99% female with just the penis as the male part (wouldn't look that way if excess (male levels) of testosterone were in the body, and dick wouldn't function with excess amounts of estrogen either, so the penis most likely has its own hormone levels that allow it to function separately from the rest of the body).

You will never be happy. You wrench out a fake smile every single morning and tell yourself it’s going to be ok, but deep inside you feel the depression creeping up like a weed, ready to crush you under the unbearable weight.
Eventually it’ll be too much to bear - you’ll buy a rope, tie a noose, put it around your neck, and plunge into the cold abyss. Your parents will find you, heartbroken but relieved that they no longer have to live with the unbearable shame and disappointment. They’ll bury you with a headstone marked with your birth name, and every passerby for the rest of eternity will know a man is buried there. Your body will decay and go back to the dust, and all that will remain of your legacy is a skeleton that is unmistakably male.
This is your fate. This is what you chose. There is no turning back. Seethe and dilate. 

If you aren’t a tranny then have a good day.

Also just in case you’re a tranny: You will never be a real woman. You have no womb, you have no ovaries, you have no eggs. You are a homosexual man twisted by drugs and surgery into a crude mockery of nature’s perfection.
All the “validation” you get is two-faced and half-hearted. Behind your back people mock you. Your parents are disgusted and ashamed of you, your “friends” laugh at your ghoulish appearance behind closed doors.
Men are utterly repulsed by you. Thousands of years of evolution have allowed men to sniff out frauds with incredible efficiency. Even trannies who “pass” look uncanny and unnatural to a man. Your bone structure is a dead giveaway. And even if you manage to get a drunk guy home with you, he’ll turn tail and bolt the second he gets a whiff of your diseased, infected axe wound.
